# Tic-Tac-Toe

```{r}
source("./tic_tac_toe.R")
```



## using 'game()':

```{r}
value_table <- initialize_state_value(NA)
game(verbose = T)
```

## using 'run()'

```{r}
result_run <- run(40, 100, eps = 0.01, alpha = 0.5)
plot(result_run, type = "l")
```

## using 'runs()'

```{r}
result_runs <- runs(10, 100, 100, eps = 0.01, alpha = 0.5)
plot(colMeans(result_runs), type = "l")
```
